meanings: A living (person's) mouth would not be cobwebbed , Everyday brings its bread with it

meanings.meaning: the improbability of finding them alive

vlive.korean: 형은 인생 내키는 대로 살아서 - 진짜요? I live my life as I want. - Really? 듣기 View video BTS : RJRJ 알제알제
vlive.english: I live my life as I want. - Really?

vlive.korean: 훤칠하다 - 승우 씨로 살아서 뭐하고 싶으세요? He is really tall. - What would you want to do if you were Seungwoo? 듣기 View video IDOL RADIO : 'IDOL RADIO' ep#338. 엑스원_잇 (w. X1)
vlive.english: He is really tall. - What would you want to do if you were Seungwoo?

vlive.korean: 제주도에 살아서... I live in Jeju... 듣기 View video GOT7 : 유겸이의 작업실
아이오아이 살아서 돌아왔다! I.O.I came back alive! 듣기 View video 모비딕(Mobidic) : 11회 : 마지막 뒷 이야기 편 (The last story)
외국에서 살아서 그런가? Is it because he lived abroad? 듣기 View video 렛스튜디오 (LETstudio) : [여행에서로맨스를만날확률시즌2] EP 06_첫 데이트가 망했을 때
vlive.english: Is it because he lived abroad?

examples.korean: She had despaired of ever being rescued alive. 발음듣기 그녀는 살아서 구출되는 것은 단념했었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She had despaired of ever being rescued alive. 발음

examples.korean: the improbability of finding them alive 발음듣기 그들이 살아서 발견될 것 같지 않음 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: the improbability of finding them alive 발음

examples.korean: Would that he had lived to see it. 발음듣기 그 분이 살아서 그것을 보셨다면 얼마나 좋았을까. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Would that he had lived to see it. 발음

examples.korean: In my dream all my toys came to life. 발음듣기 내 꿈속에서는 내 장난감들이 모두 살아서 움직였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: In my dream all my toys came to life. 발음

examples.korean: She feels very cut off living in the country. 발음듣기 그녀는 시골에 살아서 단절감을 많이 느낀다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She feels very cut off living in the country. 발음
